title: All 32 - Chicago Bears: Breaking down the impending Nick Foles-Mitchell Trubisky QB battle with Kevin Fishbain (Football 6/16)
description:
Will Brinson is on vacation. That wouldn't have mattered though for this episode, as noted Bears fan/Superfriend Sean Wagner-McGough takes over the hosting duties to chat with Kevin Fishbain of The Athletic. Sean and Kevin discuss the state of the franchise (1:00), Foles vs. Trubisky (5:30), and the ceiling/floor for Chicago in 2020 (15:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @seanjwagner, @kfishbain
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: The Bears figure to have the most heated quarterback competition entering camp. Kevin Fishbain of The Athletic details the upcoming QB battle in Chicago.
